answers.answer: Have a cystoscopy/blood test to be sure that cancer has been ruled out.  Then try pelvic physical therapy.  www.pelvicpainrehab.com

question: I am a 20 year old virgin female and I started urinating frequently about 3 months ago (a lot every hour or so) and did a urine test at my doctor which came up clean.  I do not have diabetes or a UTI.  She said it was probably just stress, but it didn't go away, so I went back a few weeks later.  I had an ultrasound of my bladder and it was normal.  My doctor made me do another urine test and a little bit of blood showed.  She doesn't know what it could be and I don't know what is wrong with me.  It has been going on for a few months now and it is really quite annoying having to go to the washroom constantly.  What could it be?
title: Frequent Urination, clean urine
